title: Opening
description: If you are the first person in the farm complete this checklist!

checklist.text: Check all the lights are on in the farm

config.text:
1. Ensure the lights for the towers are on, if they are not on go to the breaker on the north east side of the farm and flip the lever back
2. Check all the lights are on in the Microgreen racks.
3. Check the NFT Upstairs
If there is water on the floor report it. Make sure to also check upstairs. Go to TEAMS -> CHAT -> GROW SPACE -> GENERAL

This only needs to be a basic analysis of the NFT, Towers, and Microgreen systems. Look for wilting, discolored leaves, drooping stems, pests, or generally weird things and report issues to: TEAMS -> CHAT -> GROW SPACE -> GENERAL

2. Check all the lights are on in the Microgreen racks.
3. Check the NFT Upstairs
If there is water on the floor report it. Make sure to also check upstairs. Go to TEAMS -> CHAT -> GROW SPACE -> GENERAL

This only needs to be a basic analysis of the NFT, Towers, and Microgreen systems. Look for wilting, discolored leaves, drooping stems, pests, or generally weird things and report issues to: TEAMS -> CHAT -> GROW SPACE -> GENERAL

title: Opening
description: If you are the first person in the farm complete this checklist!

steps.label: Check all the lights are on in the farm

config.text:
1. Ensure the lights for the towers are on, if they are not on go to the breaker on the north east side of the farm and flip the lever back
2. Check all the lights are on in the Microgreen racks.
3. Check the NFT Upstairs
If there is water on the floor report it. Make sure to also check upstairs. Go to TEAMS -> CHAT -> GROW SPACE -> GENERAL

This only needs to be a basic analysis of the NFT, Towers, and Microgreen systems. Look for wilting, discolored leaves, drooping stems, pests, or generally weird things and report issues to: TEAMS -> CHAT -> GROW SPACE -> GENERAL

config.text:
1. Ensure the lights for the towers are on, if they are not on go to the breaker on the north east side of the farm and flip the lever back
2. Check all the lights are on in the Microgreen racks.
3. Check the NFT Upstairs
If there is water on the floor report it. Make sure to also check upstairs. Go to TEAMS -> CHAT -> GROW SPACE -> GENERAL

This only needs to be a basic analysis of the NFT, Towers, and Microgreen systems. Look for wilting, discolored leaves, drooping stems, pests, or generally weird things and report issues to: TEAMS -> CHAT -> GROW SPACE -> GENERAL

1. Ensure the lights for the towers are on, if they are not on go to the breaker on the north east side of the farm and flip the lever back
2. Check all the lights are on in the Microgreen racks.
3. Check the NFT Upstairs
If there is water on the floor report it. Make sure to also check upstairs. Go to TEAMS -> CHAT -> GROW SPACE -> GENERAL

This only needs to be a basic analysis of the NFT, Towers, and Microgreen systems. Look for wilting, discolored leaves, drooping stems, pests, or generally weird things and report issues to: TEAMS -> CHAT -> GROW SPACE -> GENERAL

title: Opening
description: If you are the first person in the farm complete this checklist!

steps.label: Check all the lights are on in the farm

config.text:
1. Ensure the lights for the towers are on, if they are not on go to the breaker on the north east side of the farm and flip the lever back
2. Check all the lights are on in the Microgreen racks.
3. Check the NFT Upstairs
If there is water on the floor report it. Make sure to also check upstairs. Go to TEAMS -> CHAT -> GROW SPACE -> GENERAL

This only needs to be a basic analysis of the NFT, Towers, and Microgreen systems. Look for wilting, discolored leaves, drooping stems, pests, or generally weird things and report issues to: TEAMS -> CHAT -> GROW SPACE -> GENERAL

title: Opening
description: If you are the first person in the farm complete this checklist!

steps.label: Check all the lights are on in the farm

config.text:
1. Ensure the lights for the towers are on, if they are not on go to the breaker on the north east side of the farm and flip the lever back
2. Check all the lights are on in the Microgreen racks.
3. Check the NFT Upstairs
If there is water on the floor report it. Make sure to also check upstairs. Go to TEAMS -> CHAT -> GROW SPACE -> GENERAL

This only needs to be a basic analysis of the NFT, Towers, and Microgreen systems. Look for wilting, discolored leaves, drooping stems, pests, or generally weird things and report issues to: TEAMS -> CHAT -> GROW SPACE -> GENERAL

title: Replace Fan and Furnace Filter
description: Replace the filter for the furnace and the fans to make sure that we don't get Mildew

title: Opening
description: If you are the first person in the farm complete this checklist!

checklist.text: Check all the lights are on in the farm

config.text:
1. Ensure the lights for the towers are on, if they are not on go to the breaker on the north east side of the farm and flip the lever back
2. Check all the lights are on in the Microgreen racks.
3. Check the NFT Upstairs
If there is water on the floor report it. Make sure to also check upstairs. Go to TEAMS -> CHAT -> GROW SPACE -> GENERAL

This only needs to be a basic analysis of the NFT, Towers, and Microgreen systems. Look for wilting, discolored leaves, drooping stems, pests, or generally weird things and report issues to: TEAMS -> CHAT -> GROW SPACE -> GENERAL

title: Check pH and Water Levels in Towers
description: This process ensures the water pH and levels in all towers are within the optimal range for plant health. Adjustments are made as needed to maintain a target pH of 6.0 and adequate water levels using ATOs (Automatic Top Offs).

title: Clean Tower Garden Pots
description: This task ensures Tower Garden pots and structural rods are thoroughly cleaned and prepped after soaking. Removing built-up grime supports plant health and extends the life of the towers.

description: This task covers the full assembly of Tower Garden units

description: Plant the needed towers for the week based on the checklist.
